original_text: It was useless before you put it on the fire. It is even more useless after the fire has burnt it. You cannot make anything with it.
korean_text: 그것이 온전할 때에도 아무 제조에 합당하지 아니하였거든 하물며 불에 살라지고 탄 후에 어찌 제조에 합당하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: It was useless before you put it on the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그것을 불 위에 놓기 전에도 쓸모 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: It is even more useless after the fire has burnt it
sentences.korean_translation: 불에 탄 후에는 더욱 쓸모 없습니다

sentences.original_text: You cannot make anything with it
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그것으로 아무것도 만들 수 없습니다
